entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQR.IFRS.0080.7893] ifrs-full:EquityInstrumentsHeld has a value of -857,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Patrimonio neto with a value of 55,820,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 54,958,000 + 2,748,000 ) with a value of 57,706,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -3 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -3
Rule Element Id:9542 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800GZESQUFLUH5402/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES.zip/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES/reports/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES.xhtml 15972

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 03 - Resultado [resumen] but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperations, amper:ResultadoConsolidadoDespuesDeLasOperacionesDiscontinuadas, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 1,668,000 reported in the network role http://amper.com/xbrl/2021/roles/EstadoDeSituacionFinancieraResumen should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 1,668,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://amper.com/xbrl/2021/roles/EstadoDeCambiosEnElPatrimonioNetoResumen. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of TreasuryShares : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800GZESQUFLUH5402/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES.zip/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES/reports/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES.xhtml 15972

The properties of this ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800GZESQUFLUH5402/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES.zip/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES/reports/959800GZESQUFLUH5402-2021-12-31-ES.xhtml 15972
